name: Standard Order

on: push

jobs:
  biryani-chef:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node (Stove)
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 18

      - name: Buy Ingredients
        run: npm install

      - name: Health Inspection
        run: npm run lint

      - name: Taste Test
        run: npm test

      - name: Cook Food
        run: npm run build
